hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I'm sorry, he's where can i purchase illegal drugs Since becoming CEO in 2000, Ballmer has more than tripled Microsoft's annual sales (from $23 billion to $78 billion) and more than doubled profits ($9.4 billion to $21.9 billion). In that time he's returned $164 billion to shareholders while adding around $90 billion to Microsoft's net assets. Very few CEOs have done better. Many tech companies â AMD, Dell, HP, Intel, Nokia, Sony, Sun etc â have done worse under multiple CEOs. Indeed, Ballmer has done much better than many people expected a dozen years ago.
